help.short: Create action must be performed through our operations team.
Delete action must be performed through our operations team.
List a list of SAP HANA instances in the specified subscription. The operations returns various properties of each SAP HANA on Azure instance.
The operation to restart a SAP HANA instance.
Get properties of a SAP HANA instance for the specified subscription, resource group, and instance name.
The operation to shutdown a SAP HANA instance.
The operation to start a SAP HANA instance.
Update the Tags field of a SAP HANA instance for the specified subscription, resource group, and instance name.
